category: news
title: "Freshfields Hires Team of Machine Learning Experts Amid Data-Heavy Client Work"
excerpt: "Counsel Gerrit Beckhaus, who co-leads the firm’s tech hub Freshfields Lab, said the firm faced “new challenges” partly due to huge amounts of data in client work. He added the additional capability with the machine learning experts will allow for further collaboration and opportunities for knowledge sharing and engagement."
